fullname: UN/LOCODE (United Nations Code for Trade and Transport Locations)
name: unlocode
license_text: UN/LOCODE is freely available to all interested users.
description: UN/LOCODE is based on a code structure set up by ECLAC and a list of locations originating in ESCAP, developed in UNCTAD in co-operation with transport organisations like IATA and the ICS and with active contributions from national governments and commercial bodies.
